content: Hello!Selling BTC via 3D party:1) UK bank transfers, GBP. Payout 72% [max transaction is £500]2) European bank transfers (SEPA), EUR. Payout 74% [max transaction is €1k]3) PayPal friends and family; credit card donations [eqv £50-£1k per tx]. Payout 72%4) card2card payment via fin.do [eqv €100-€1k per tx]. Payout 72%Verification don't needed!I'm looking for partners with everyday payments.ESCROW: Paxful, localbitcoins, hodlhodl or any other p2p trading platform (subject of discussion).Contact: https://t.me/bankmaster2P.S. I see that many guys trying to scam me using faked 'bitcointalk escrow' and call me scammer cause I don't want to pay 'escrow' to unknown person it Telegram. That's why please let's work via p2p platform if you want escrow.P.S. Also selling UK full verified Skrill, Neteller, Paxful accounts.
